entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
